data.title: Natsuna Watanabe
data.text:
Japanese actress

Natsuna Watanabe (渡辺 夏菜, Watanabe Natsuna, born May 23, 1989), better known as just Natsuna (夏菜, Natsuna), is a Japanese actress.[1][2]

She was born in Saitama Prefecture. When she graduated from high-school she decided to focus her career entirely on acting. As of 2009, she shortened her stage name and is now simply going by "Natsuna" (夏菜). In 2012, she landed the coveted lead role in the NHK Asadora Jun to Ai after an audition of over 2250 actors.[3]

Personal life

[edit]

Natsuna married her non-celebrity boyfriend on January 16, 2021.[1] She gave birth to her first child, a daughter, on March 1, 2022.[57] Natsuna announced on her instagram that she is pregnant with the couple's second child on March 29, 2023.[58]
